mapper.sql: id, step_name AS stepName, trans_record_id AS transRecordId, insert_num AS insertNum, update_num AS updateNum, intput_num AS intputNum, error_num AS errorNum, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, table_flag AS tableFlag
mapper.select: select ktl.step_name, t2.add_time, ktl.insert_num, ktl.update_num, ktl.error_num, ktl.start_date, ktl.end_date from( select * from( select kt.id trans_id,ktr.id trans_record_id, ktr.add_time, SUBSTR(ktr.add_time FROM 1 FOR 10) add_date from k_trans kt JOIN k_trans_record ktr on kt.id = ktr.RECORD_TRANS and kt.trans_name REGEXP '^自动' where ktr.add_time >= #{logDate} and ktr.add_time <= concat(#{logDate},' 23:59:59') order by ktr.add_time desc )t1 GROUP BY add_date, trans_id ) t2 join k_trans_log ktl on t2.trans_record_id = ktl.trans_record_id where table_flag = '1'
